cgcloud__Account_Specific_Product_Condit.name: cgcloud__Account_Specific_Product_Condition__c
cgcloud__Account_Specific_Product_Condit.description: Holds the relation between a customer and the condition template.

cgcloud__Price_Type__c.description: Type or usage of a price.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the account-specific product conditions record.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: The date from when the entry is valid.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: The date until when the entry is valid.

cgcloud__Value__c.description: Specifies the value of a condition.
